baud_rate_selection.notes: Applies to the RS-485 Modbus RTU interface.

flags.name: inverter_run_request
flags.description: 1 keeps the inverter enabled; 0 issues a remote stop command.

flags.name: bdc_enable_request
flags.description: Enable the BDC (battery DC converter) for battery-ready mode.

inverter_enable_flags.notes: Write the combined bit mask (0–3). Bits 2–15 are reserved and should remain 0.

1.label: persist
1.description: Keep power-factor related commands in NVRAM.

power_factor_x10000.notes: Divide by 10 000 to obtain the power factor. Values <1 lead (capacitive), >1 lag (inductive).

flags.name: freq_derating_recover
flags.description: Allow automatic recovery after frequency derating.

safety_function_flags.notes: Bits 0–3 relate to CEI 0-21 compliance; bits 4–6 to AS/NZS (SAA) requirements. Bits 11–15 are reserved.

u32_decivolt_ampere.notes: Unsigned 32-bit value stored in 0.1 VA increments (high word first).

register_types.description: Remote enable bits for the inverter (bit 0) and BDC (bit 1).
Safety function enable mask (SPI, LVFRT, DRMS, Volt/Var, etc.).
Indicates whether a country/regional profile has been selected.
Inverter serial number stored as a 10-character ASCII string.
